Title: Ice-Watch Ice Skull Deep Water unisex ICE.SK.DWR.U.S.15
Description: chapelle_jewellery Visit our eBay Shop Add us to your Favourites list > Subscribe to our Newsletter > About Chapelle Delivery The Chapelle Guarantee Ice-Watch Ice Skull Deep Water unisex ICE.SK.DWR.U.S.15 RRP £69.95 Now £39.95 Description This deep water blue coloured silicone strap watch has a highly decorative skull pattern dial. The gold coloured skulls are raised and have a highly polished finish; they stand out boldly against the dark blue background. A gold coloured crown and highly polished gold col-oured buckle tie into the pattern on the dial. The sleek silicone strap is smooth and com-fortable to wear every day. You can easily adjust the length of the strap with the gold buckle which secures it in place. A water resistant level of 100m has been given to this particular watch which means it is suitable to wear whilst swimming in shallow water or whilst bathing. The watch measures approximately 43mm in width including the crown and has a case depth of 8mm. The strap measures approximately 20mm at the widest point, the size of this Ice-Watch is suitable for both men and women. Ice-Watches have a two year manufacturer’s warranty and are supplied in their official branded presentation box and packaging. Chapelle are authorised stockists of many popular watch brands including Ice-Watches. Chapelle reference 08990510. Other Brands we stock About Chapelle Chapelle Jewellery is a family run business offering jewellery and watches with discounts of up to 50% off RRP. We purchase at the best possible prices and pass on these savings to our customers. All our items are new and perfect goods; we do not sell seconds or second-hand items. We are authorised stockists of all the brands we sell so you can be confident you're buying from a reputable company. Delivery Orders dispatched within the UK will be sent using Royal Mail Recorded Signed For first class. Orders being sent to international destinations will be sent by Royal Mail International Signed For delivery. Visit our ebay store for our full range >>
